name: io.github.dynatrace-oss/Dynatrace-Managed-MCP
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Dynatrace Managed (on-premise). Access logs, events, metrics from Dynatrace via MCP.

environmentVariables.name: DT_ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGS
environmentVariables.description: An escaped JSON array that defines the Dynatrace Managed environment(s) to connect to. See README file for contents of this.

environmentVariables.name: LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Logging level (e.g. debug, info, warning, error)
